name: Manifest Web Design
description:
Manifest Web Design is a web development and design company. We serve local and international clients in a variety of industries. Our services range from custom web applications and programming, to mobile applications and advanced business intelligence tools. We use a consultative approach to identify needs and match them to the right solutions.
Â 

Our team consists of conceptual designers, developers, graphic artists & project managers. We enjoy close and friendly collaboration among team members.
